histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.Android.GenerateResult{ModelExecutionFeature}
histogram.summary: Records the result of generate on Android for {ModelExecutionFeature}. Logged exactly once when a generate request has completed.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.Android.IsModelDownloadSuccessful{ModelExecutionFeature}
histogram.summary: Records whether the on-device model download was successful on Android for {ModelExecutionFeature}. Logged exactly once when a download request has completed.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.Android.ModelDownloadFailureReason{ModelExecutionFeature}
histogram.summary: Records the failure reason of on-device model download on Android for {ModelExecutionFeature}. Logged exactly once when a download request has failed.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.BenchmarkDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes to run the benchmark in OnDeviceModelService.GetEstimatedPerformanceClass(). Logged whenever GetEstimatedPerformanceClass() is called.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.BenchmarkEstimatedTokensPerSecond.{Stage}
histogram.summary: The estimated tokens per second this device can achieve during {Stage}. Logged whenever OnDeviceModelService.GetEstimatedPerformanceClass() is called.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.BenchmarkSuccess
histogram.summary: Records whether there was an error running the tokens per second benchmark. Logged whenever OnDeviceModelService.GetEstimatedPerformanceClass() is called.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.BenchmarkVeryLowReason
histogram.summary: Records the reason the benchmark returned kVeryLow performance class. Logged whenever kVeryLow performance class is returned from running the benchmark.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.DeviceHeapSize.{GpuType}
histogram.summary: The maxiumum GPU heap size for a device with {GpuType} GPU. Logged whenever OnDeviceModelService.GetEstimatedPerformanceClass() is called.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.Embedding.LoadDlcStatus
histogram.summary: Records any failure reason (or success) when attempting to load the embedding model DLC, this is the first part of the process during LoadEmbeddingModel().

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.Embedding.LoadEmbeddingStatus
histogram.summary: Records any failure reason (or success) that results from the mojo call LoadEmbeddingModel().

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.Embedding.TfliteRunnerLoadStatus
histogram.summary: Records any failure reason (or success) when attempting to load the embedding model into memory so that it can run, this is the second part of the process during LoadEmbeddingModel().

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.Embedding.TfliteRunnerRunStatus
histogram.summary: Records any failure reason (or success) when attempting to run the embedding model.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.GpuBlockedReason
histogram.summary: Records the reason the GPU was blocked in OnDeviceModelService. Logged whenever ChromeML::IsGpuBlocked() is called.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.GpuErrorReason
histogram.summary: Records a fatal error received by the OnDeviceModelService. Logged whenever the service crashes due to a GPU error.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.LoadModelDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes to load a model in the OnDeviceModelService. Logged every time a model is successfully loaded.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.LoadPlatformModelStatus
histogram.summary: The result of loading a platform model in the OnDeviceModelService. Logged every time when loading a platform model.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.MaxBufferSize.{GpuType}
histogram.summary: The maxiumum buffer size for a device with {GpuType} GPU. Logged whenever OnDeviceModelService.GetEstimatedPerformanceClass() is called.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.QueueTime.{Priority}
histogram.summary: Records the time a task for a session with {Priority} priority spent in the queue in the OnDeviceModelService. Logged each time a task is run for a session.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.SystemRAM.{GpuType}
histogram.summary: The total system memory for a device with {GpuType} GPU. Logged whenever OnDeviceModelService.GetEstimatedPerformanceClass() is called.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.TokenCount.Input{Type}
histogram.summary: The number of {Type} tokens processed by the OnDeviceModel as a chunk of input. Note that for some types of input (e.g. images and audio) there is considerably more work done than just processing the tokens. Logged each time a {Type} chunk is processed.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.TokenCount.{Stage}
histogram.summary: The number of {Stage} tokens processed by the OnDeviceModel. Logged each time the OnDeviceModel processes {Stage}.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.TokensPerSecond.Input{Type}
histogram.summary: The tokens per second seen when processing a chunk of {Type} input. Note that for some types of input (e.g. images and audio) there is considerably more work done than just processing the tokens. Logged each time a {Type} chunk is processed.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.TokensPerSecond.{Stage}
histogram.summary: The tokens per second seen when processing {Stage}. Logged each time the OnDeviceModel processes {Stage}.

histogram.name: OnDeviceModel.TotalTime.Input{Type}
histogram.summary: The total time taken when processing a chunk of {Type} input. Note that for some types of input (e.g. images and audio) there is considerably more work done than just processing the tokens. Logged each time a {Type} chunk is processed.
